reporting-org.narrative: European Commission - DG Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations

title.narrative: Contract with UNRWA for ''Strengthening the resilience of Palestinian refugees from Syria in Jordan''.

description.narrative: With regard to the support component for the Palestine refugees from Syria, since the onset of the Syria crisis, the UN Relief and Works Agency for Palestine refugees in the near east (UNRWA) Jordan has provided support to Palestinian refugees from Syria (PRS). UNRWA holds the mandate and responsibility to serve these refugees that do not have access to UNHCR refugee services. Only 18% of PRS reported receiving additional assistance from a humanitarian agency other than UNRWA in February 2014. A

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
